hooks.command: file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; if [ -n "$file" ] && [[ "$file" == *.py ]]; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && ruff format --quiet "$file" 2>/dev/null && ruff check --fix --quiet "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi

file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; if [ -n "$file" ] && [[ "$file" == *.ts || "$file" == *.tsx || "$file" == *.js || "$file" == *.jsx || "$file" == *.css ]]; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/frontend" && npx prettier --write "$file" 2>/dev/null; fi

file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; if [ -n "$file" ] && [[ "$file" == */uv.lock || "$file" == */pnpm-lock.yaml ]]; then echo 'BLOCK: Do not edit lockfiles directly. Use mise run setup (backend) or mise run frontend:setup (frontend).' >&2; exit 2; fi

file="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS"; if [ -n "$file" ] && [[ "$file" == */.env || "$file" == */.env.* ]]; then echo 'BLOCK: Do not edit .env files â€” they contain secrets. Edit example.env instead.' >&2; exit 2; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '\bgit commit\b'; then cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && mise run validate 2>&1 | tail -20; exit_code=$?; if [ $exit_code -ne 0 ]; then echo 'BLOCK: Validation failed. Fix issues before committing.' >&2; exit 2; fi; fi
